Title: Ex-FBI chief Comey pleads not guilty in felony case pushed by Trump
Summary: Ex-FBI chief Comey pleads not guilty in felony case pushed by Trump . Former FBI director pleaded not guilty to felony charges seen as an escalation of President Donald Trump's campaign of retribution .

Title: Injured Huijsen replaced by Laporte in Spain squad
Summary: Real Madrid defender Dean Huijsen withdraws from Spain squad for 2026 World Cup qualifiers . Aymeric Laporte replaced by Real Madrid team-mate in Spain squad . Spain are looking to qualify for the 2026 tournament in 2026 .

Title: Trump calls for jailing of Chicago mayor, Illinois governor
Summary: US President Donald Trump calls for jailing of Chicago mayor, Illinois governor . “Chicago Mayor should be in jail for failing to protect Ice Officers!” he tweeted .

Title: Elche striker Mir indicted over sexual assault allegations
Summary: Elche striker Rafa Mir indicted for sexual assault allegations ‘involving carnal knowledge and the use of violence’ The 28-year-old, currently on loan at Elche from Sevilla, allegedly committed the offence .

Title: Serie A chief blasts Rabiot’s criticism of Milan match in Australia
Summary: Serie A CEO slams Adrien Rabiot’s criticism of UEFA decision to allow AC Milan to play a league fixture in Australia . In an interview with French newspaper Le Figaro, Rabiot, who plays his club football for Paris Saint-Germain .

Title: How I was attacked in Abuja by 20 tanker drivers, NUPENG President tells court
Summary: According to him, the tanker drivers and thugs, armed with weapons and galloons of petrol, stormed the hotel where he lodged with other NUPENG members . According to the president, he was attacked in Abuja by 20 tanker drivers .

Title: Kagarko, Koro leaders dismiss political misinformation on farmers–herders clash
Summary: Leaders of Koro District and Kagarko Local Government Area of Kaduna State have dismissed the reports circulating on social media exaggerating a recent misunderstanding between farmers and herders in the area . Leaders dismiss the reports as false and politically motivated .

Title: Over 60 illegal health colleges operating in Kaduna — Practitioners warn of looming Public Health crisis
Summary: The Association of Community Health Practitioners of Nigeria (ACHPN), Kaduna State chapter, has expressed concern over the rising number of unaccredited private Colleges of Health Technology operating across the state .

Title: No better time to choose Nigeria than now – Tinubu tells investors
Summary: President Bola Tinubu says there is no better time for investors to come and invest in Nigeria than now . The President says investors should choose Nigeria rather than stay away from Nigeria .

Title: Alleged Genocide: Christian lives are not statistics — CAN tells FG
Summary: CAN said many Christian communities, particularly in northern Nigeria, had suffered attacks, loss of life, and the destruction of places of worship . CAN: Many Christian communities have suffered attacks and loss of lives .
